title: Tied Up
description: Paola and Leandro have been married for almost 4 years. Leandro always remembers important dates for both of them and makes a point of giving Paola gifts. But this time, the gift will be special.Straight Erotic Contents – For Adults Only.NEW COVER – SAME CONTENTSSoon, 2 more Tales from the Series !
author: G.M. Genovese
